note: Dr. Karina Nielsen is a marine ecologist and leads the Oregon Sea Grant program at Oregon State University. But the toots are mine. My research focuses on basic and use-inspired questions that seek to understand, conserve, and sustain the extraordinary biodiversity of coastal ecosystems where people, land, and waters meet (rocky shores, sandy beaches, estuaries). I believe that people and nature thrive when we connect our humanity to the work of science and policy.
